title: Bug 38385Japanese Input (IME) not doesn't come up
description: Bug 38385Japanese Input (IME) not doesn't come up build 2.1.1 (20030602)Changes to fix a GP and focus trouble on Motif work in Linux but broke theJapanese Input on AIX, Solaris and possibly HP (we can't test this).SSQ andSN are working on a fix.We should do this for 2.1.1.
